snippet: The series of bombings came during the Muslim holy month of Ramadan and followed a surge in attacks that has lasted for months.
abstract: Series of bombings across Iraq leave at least 40 people dead and dozens wounded; incidents are part of country's worst wave of violence in years, with more than 300 dying so far in July.
lead_paragraph: The series of bombings came during the Muslim holy month of Ramadan and followed a surge in attacks that has lasted for months.

headline.main: Blasts Across Iraq Kill at Least 40 Amid a Surge in Attacks
headline.print_headline: Blasts Across Iraq Kill at Least 40 Amid a Surge in Attacks
